item.title: invaders writeup
item.description: Challenge description We’ve found an old-school space-invaders game on a PwnTopia server, but it seems to be unusually large in size. Maybe something is hidden inside of it… Solution we are given binary file (game): first we can see that this is Godot Engine game, so we can extract the game - for example using Godot RE Tools after opening the game in Godot there is suspicious fragment of code:
